general_advisory: As per the forecast, dry weather may prevail with some cloudy conditions. Farmers are advised to monitor pest activities and apply irrigation as needed. Various treatments are recommended for different crops to manage diseases and pests.

advisory: In transplanted paddy, spray recommended herbicides to control weeds.
To manage Bud Necrosis, use Neem Based Pesticide or chemical sprays.
For Sett Rot management, use specific fungicides for control.
To control Aphids, use Neem Based Pesticide followed by chemical sprays.
To manage Fruit rot and Die back disease, spray recommended fungicides.
To control Alternaria Leaf Spot, use specific fungicides.
To manage Purple Blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray specific fungicides.
To manage mango hoppers, spray recommended insecticides at specific stages.
To prevent Powdery mildew, spray Carbendazim preventively.
Ensure Foot and Mouth diseases vaccination for cattle.
Vaccinate chicks for Sleeping disease and other common ailments.
